content:
Hello there, after x.py build, I got "note: ld: library not found for -lrustc-dev_rt.asan" when "../rust/build/x86_64-apple-darwin/stage1/bin/rustc test.rs -Zsanitizer=address -o prog", am I missing any build stage?
It would be great if someone can give a hint or explanation, thx
I don't know if address sanitizer is built by default
Thanks Joshua. Do we have any command to trigger building address sanitizer
I see sanitizers = false in config.toml.example, try setting that to true?
